links.title: Louisiana porn star Stormy Daniels to appear on CBS' '60 Minutes' Sunday night
links.description: Louisiana native and adult film star Stormy Daniels will appear on CBS' "60 Minutes" Sunday in a much-anticipated interview to discuss her alleged affair with President Donald Trump more than a decade ago. Daniels, whose legal name is Stephanie Clifford, has said their affair began in 2006 and continued for about a year.

$HIMX Will continue see $ from $AAPL VSCEL ($FNSR not concern until some time 2019). But real $$$ will be Android OEMs rear facing SLiM.

$HIMX $AAPL Rear-facing 3D sensing technology possibly slated for fall 2019 iPhone, allowing Apple to press AR advantage https://www.google.com/amp/s/appleinsider.com/articles/18/02/14/rear-facing-3d-sensing-technology-possibly-slated-for-fall-2019-iphone-allowing-apple-to-press-ar-advantage/amp/

links.title: Rear-facing 3D sensing technology possibly slated for fall 2019 iPhone, allowing Apple to press AR advantage
links.description: With the iPhone X just three months out of the gate, and discussions about the 2018 iPhone refresh starting, eyes are starting to look at 2019, with new supply chain discussion by an investment analyst firm suggesting that Apple is now working on a world-facing 3D sensor to assert dominance in augmented reality.

messages.body: $HIMX When $AAPL ditches ToF for world facing AR (as speculated) and moves to VSCEL. Android OEMs will move to world facing SLiM.

messages.body: $AAPL 5 Reasons to Buy Apple Stock and Hold for the Long Term https://www.fool.com/amp/investing/2018/03/24/5-reasons-to-buy-apple-stock-and-hold-for-the-long.aspx

links.title: 5 Reasons to Buy Apple Stock and Hold for the Long Term
links.description: When ( Apple NASDAQ:AAPL) released its most recent financial results, the numbers were scrutinized by Wall Street. Even in light of its record-breaking performance, investors appeared to want even more. That may have been the result of some confusion about year-over-year unit sales comparisons, as one fewer week in the current-year quarter distorted the results compared to the prior year.

message.body: $AMZN  Trump’s position on tariffs is one of his most long-standing political beliefs  The Hill http://thehill.com/homenews/administration/380075-the-memo-unbound-trump-breaks-from-restraints#.WrffdFWLS3g.twitter

links.title: The Memo: Unbound Trump breaks from restraints
links.description: Call it "Trump Unbound." After a tumultuous week, has exiled several voices of restraint from his administration, added more hawkish supporters to his team and shown an ever-greater reliance on his own gut instincts.
